page.title: 05Friday Bridge Light Industry
page.content: There is not much industry in Friday Bridge. W P T was established in one of the old chapels but this year has moved to new premises outside the village. With a work force of 13 they manufacture filling machines for the food processing industry. Their machines have been exported to France, Canada, Malta, Holland, Germany, New Zealand, Australia and Cyprus. They manufacture go-karting spares. In addition they repair and rebuild farm machinery. In 1980 Gas Tanks moved into the village with a workforce of 6. They re-condition tanks, many of which have a capacity of more than 150 tons. The end products have been exported to Ireland, Nigeria and Malta.
